amendment.description: Amendment sought to strike section 336, relating to climate change.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 4 printed in House Report 115-217 to strike section 336, relating to climate change.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Perry amendment (A020) Failed by recorded vote: 185 - 234 (Roll no. 368).

action.text: Amendment failed in Committee of the Whole
